entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as the one who wrote a law with a loophole. He is also referred to as 'you' by Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as the one who is shouting at Arthur Weasley.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who arrived in a car that Mr Weasley was not intending to fly.

relationships.description: Mrs Weasley is shouting at Arthur Weasley.
Mr Weasley was not intending to fly with Harry.
